# Server SDK Documentation Map

## Core
- [INDEX.md](INDEX.md): MANDATORY READ. Concepts, architecture, and dependency relationships. Start here.
- [quickstart.md](quickstart.md): Copy-pasteable boilerplate code.

## API & Class Signatures
- [api/mcp-server.md](api/mcp-server.md): READ for `McpServer` constructor options, `registerTool`/`registerResource`/`registerPrompt` methods, and deprecated signatures.
- [api/stdio-server-transport.md](api/stdio-server-transport.md): READ for `StdioServerTransport` (CLI) API.
- [api/streamable-http-server-transport.md](api/streamable-http-server-transport.md): READ for `StreamableHTTPServerTransport` (HTTP/SSE) API.
- [api/sse-server-transport.md](api/sse-server-transport.md): READ for `SSEServerTransport` (Legacy/Deprecated) API.

## Feature Implementation
- [capabilities/tools.md](capabilities/tools.md): READ for syntax on registering tools (`registerTool`) and Zod schema validation.
- [capabilities/resources.md](capabilities/resources.md): READ for resource URI templates and content handling (`registerResource`).
- [capabilities/prompts.md](capabilities/prompts.md): READ for prompt registration patterns (`registerPrompt`).
- [capabilities/sampling.md](capabilities/sampling.md): READ for `server.createMessage` (Sampling) usage.

## Patterns
- [patterns/authentication.md](patterns/authentication.md): READ for OAuth flows and `auth/*` middleware usage.
- [patterns/error-handling.md](patterns/error-handling.md): READ for `McpError` usage and error codes.
- [types.md](types.md): REFERENCE. TypeScript definitions for McpServer, Transports, and Capabilities.
